REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0798 reute u f BC-NIPPON-SIGNAL-SWISS-F 04-02 0080

TEXT.TITLE: NIPPON SIGNAL SWISS FRANC NOTES SET AT 1-1/4 PCT
TEXT.BODY: Nippon Signal Co Ltd's 50 mln Swiss franc five-year notes issue with warrants has been priced at 1-1/4 pct compared with the originally indicated 1-3/8 pct, lead manager Morgan Stanley SA said. Each 50,000-franc bond carries 81 warrants entitling the holder to buy 100 Nippon Signal shares for 594 yen each. The shares last traded at 579 yen. The Swiss franc/yen exchange rate was fixed at 97.27. REUTER
